common.add_money_to_account: Press here to add money to your account
common.add_to_homescreen_intro: Install suma to your homescreen for an optimized experience.
common.scooter_cost: {{startCost, sumaCurrency}} to start then {{costPerMinute, sumaCurrency}}/min + taxes
common.waitlisted: Great! You are on the waiting list and we'll let you know when it's available.

contact_list.choose_language: Please select a preferred language to continue to your savings!
contact_list.referral_label: How did you hear about suma?
contact_list.sign_up_agreement: By clicking submit, you are agreeing to receive periodic SMS and/or MMS messages from suma. Message and data rates may apply. Text HELP for more information. Text STOP to stop receiving messages.
contact_list.signup_intro: Fill in the blanks below to join our contact list, and we will update you on all our projects and upcoming money saving opportunities. We’re so excited!
contact_list.success_intro:
Thank you for signing up, and welcome to the suma app!

We will update you on all future projects, money saving opportunities, and how to complete the app enrollment process. To learn more about suma, visit our website at $t(strings:common:mysuma_website_link), or check us out on our social media using the link below. Chat soon!

dashboard.check_ongoing_trip: You have an ongoing trip. Please make sure you end it when you are finished with your ride!
dashboard.no_money: You haven't added or spent any money. $t(strings:payments:funding_link)

errors.auth_conflict: You are already signed in. Please sign out first.
errors.card_contact_bank: Your card was declined. You can try again, but if that does not work you'll need to reach out to your issuer to resolve the failure, or user a different card.
errors.card_expired: Your card has expired. Please add a new card, and you can delete this one.
errors.card_generic: We couldn't charge your card, but we don't have much more information why. You can try again, use a different card, or contact your bank.
errors.card_insufficient_funds: Your card does not have sufficient funds available. Please try again later, or use a different card.
errors.card_invalid_cvc: Your CVC is incorrect. Please re-enter it and try again.
errors.card_invalid_expiry: Your card's expiration date is incorrect. Please re-enter it and try again.
errors.card_invalid_number: Your card number is incorrect. Please re-enter it and try again.
errors.card_permanent_failure: It looks like your card is no longer valid. Please add a new card, and you can delete this one.
errors.card_try_again: Our card processor is having some issues. It should go through if you try again.
errors.checkout_fatal_error: Sorry, something went wrong trying to check out. Please go back and try again.
errors.checkout_no_items: There are no items in your cart, or all of your items are unavailable. Please go back and try again.
errors.conflicting_bank_account: You already have a bank account with that account and routing number. Please go back, or enter new account details.
errors.denied_geolocation: You need to enable Geolocation/Location Services to use Suma's Mobility app.
errors.enable_geolocation_instructions: Follow these instructions to enable Geolocation
errors.forbidden: You are forbidden from accessing these resources.
errors.impossible_phone_number: That doesn't look like a real phone number.
errors.invalid_credentials: Sorry, that information is not correct.
errors.invalid_order_quantity: Sorry, one or more of the items in your order are unavailable. Please go back to your cart and try again.
errors.invalid_otp: That token is not valid. Enter it again, or request a new code.
errors.invalid_permissions: You are not allowed to do that.
errors.network_error: There was a network error. Connect to the internet and try again.
errors.no_active_trip: There is no trip currently active.
errors.ongoing_trip: You must end your ongoing trip before starting a new one.
errors.product_unavailable: Sorry, this product is no longer available.
errors.read_only_technical_error: You are currently in read-only mode and cannot access any rides yet.
errors.read_only_unverified: You are in read-only mode due to having an unverified account.
errors.read_only_zero_balance: You are in read-only mode due to having a zero balance.
errors.something_went_wrong_body: Sorry, something went wrong. Let's go to your home screen so you can try again.
errors.unauthenticated: You must be log in to proceed.
errors.unhandled_error: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.validation_error: Some fields were left blank, please fill in all required fields and try again.
errors.vehicle_not_found: No vehicle found in this location.

food.confirmation_message: Respond to your confirmation message or reach out if you have any questions.
food.confirmation_subtitle: You will get a message soon with details about how to get your order.
food.fulfillment_title: How do you want to get your stuff?
food.intro: Suma wants to make it easy for you to save money on food, whether you shop at a big chain, the corner store or an organic market.
food.link_new_payment: Link a new payment method to pay for this order.
food.link_new_payment_or: Or, link a new payment method to pay for this order.
food.no_cart_items: You have nothing in your cart. [Click here to view what's available](/food '$t(strings:food:title)').
food.no_offerings: There are no food offerings currently available, please check back later.
food.no_orders: You haven’t place any orders yet.
food.no_products: There were no products found, this offering might be closed. [Click here to view available offerings](/food '$t(strings:food:title)').
food.noncash_ledger_contribution_available: Eligible for {{amount, sumaCurrency}} of the existing balance in your account. Applied at checkout.
food.terms_of_use_agreement: By clicking "place order" you agree to Suma's [Terms of Use](/terms-of-use__blank__).
food.title: Food
food.unclaimed_order_history_intro: Orders that are ready to claim will appear below. When you arrive to the order pickup location, please allow a staff member to help you "slide to claim" your order.

forms.bank_account_caption: Number of your bank account. You can get these from your online banking portal, or check out $t(strings:forms:paper_check_link).
forms.bank_account_type_caption: Choose which type of account this is. If you're not sure, use Checking.
forms.confirm_account_number_caption: Please retype your Account Number to confirm.
forms.get_started_intro: To start a new account, or sign into your existing account, please enter your phone number. We will send you a verification code to confirm the phone number.
forms.invalid_bank_account_number: Please enter your bank account number.
forms.invalid_bank_account_number_confirm: Must match your Account Number above.
forms.invalid_card_cvc: The security code is a 3 or 4 digit number on the back fo the card.
forms.invalid_card_expiry: Expiration date should be typed Month Month / Year Year, like '10 / 23'.
forms.invalid_card_number: Please double check the account number.
forms.invalid_min: Must be greater than or equal to {{constraint}}.
forms.invalid_routing_number: Please enter the 9 digit number of your bank account.
forms.name: Name
forms.nickname_caption: The name used to refer to the account in Suma.
forms.paper_check_link: [how to find your bank details from a paper check](##check-details 'Paper Check Details')
forms.routing_caption: 9-digit number for your bank. You can get these from your online banking portal, or check out $t(strings:forms:paper_check_link).

mobility.do_not_park_intro: You cannot park in this area. We may take action for repeated violations.
mobility.do_not_ride_intro: You cannot ride in this area. We may take action for repeated violations.
mobility.intro: Ride with enhanced privacy and better prices.
mobility.mobility_start_and_per_minute: Start fee is {{surchargeCents, sumaCurrency}}, then {{unitCents, sumaCurrency}} per minute
mobility.title: Mobility Services
mobility.trip_ended:
Your trip with {{vendor}} has ended.

We used {{totalCost, sumaCurrency}} of your Suma balance for this trip.

You saved {{discountAmount, sumaCurrency}}.

onboarding.enroll_intro:
Welcome to Suma! To get started, we will need to verify your identity. This makes sure you are eligible for the right programs, such as with our affordable housing partners.

**We will never share this information other than to verify your identity.**
onboarding.finish:
Thanks! Our team will check things out and be in touch with any questions, or as soon as you’re verified.

Verification usually happens within 1-2 business days.

In the meantime, you can learn more about the application and see what is available.
onboarding.finish_onboarded: Everything looks good. You’re ready to start using Suma!
onboarding.food_text: Suma partners with the grocers you already use to offer discounts and bundled benefits
onboarding.mobility_text: Reduced-fare clean-energy transportation with electric scooters and bikes
onboarding.utilities_text: Access local Community Solar projects for affordable, clean renewable energy

otp.enter_code_sent_to: Enter the code that we sent to
otp.terms: By creating an account or signing in, you accept and agree to our [Terms of Use](/terms-of-use) and [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy).

payments.account_submission_statement: After you submit your information, one of our Member Experience specialists will be in touch to confirm the account.
payments.add_funds_intro: Add funds to your Suma account so you can purchase discounted goods and services through the app.
payments.added_card_successful: Your card has been successfully linked to Suma. You can now use it to add funds to your accounts.
payments.check_details_subtitle: At the bottom of your check are three sets of numbers. The first is the 9-digit routing number. The second is your account number. The third, which you can ignore, is your check number.
payments.ledgers_intro: Your Suma accounts are used to purchase goods and services through the application, like a bank account you can use on Suma. Below is your account balance and all credits to, and debits from, your account.
payments.linked_bank_account_successful:
Your bank account has been successfully linked to Suma. Within the next day or two, one of our Member Experience specialists will be in touch to confirm the account.

Once the account is confirmed, you'll be able to add funds.
payments.no_bank_accounts_warning: You don't have any bank accounts linked.
payments.no_cards_warning: You don't have any credit or debit cards linked.

payment_intro.intro: To add money to your account, you'll need at least one *funding source*. Usually this is a bank account, but other options maybe available to you below.
payment_intro.privacy_statement: Your financial information is secured using **bank-level encryption** and **never shared without your consent**. Please see [Suma's Privacy Policy]({{ externalLinks.privacyPolicy }}) for more details about how we protect and use your financial information.

payments.payment_submission_statement_bank_accoun: After you submit your payment, you will be able to use the money immediately. The withdrawal should hit your account in 2 or 3 business days.
payments.payment_submission_statement_card: Suma will charge your card when you submit this form.
payments.payment_support_coming: Support is coming for additional sources, such as cash, money order, and adding funds through a friend.
payments.unlink_account_question: Are you sure you want to unlink this account? You can always re-add it later.
payments.unlink_account_question_subtitle: Any in-progress transactions will not be canceled.

utilities.intro:
Suma wants to make it easy for you to save money on your utility bills and make our communities more resilient against extreme weather and climate change.

Sign up for our free waiting list to help us build a community of members and to show that everyone deserves clean and affordable energy.
utilities.title: Utilities
